text:
you have given one default index.html page. now i want to open my specific 
incex.jsp file, i deployed my page in the root. and then typed the address 
localhost\index.jsp, this still opens the index.html file given by you, so now 
i deleted this index.html file restarted the server, again typed the above 
address..............No, use, againg the same file is getting opened don't know 
from where.

Please help
Thanks

Ravi Shankar
creator: banka_ravi@hotmail.com
william.barker@wilshire.com
text:
The correct place to ask this sort of question is:
  tomcat-user@jakarta.apache.org 

I have no problem changing the default index page in any released version on 
Tomcat.
